name: Hurly Durly
description:
What you see is what you get, Slide and Jump to Hurl this little bug around! dont let him slip through the cracks.

Mouse Click on the browser. ASDW to move, Space to jump and R to reload the level.

GameJame164 is my first game jam, I had tons of fun and not enough time. 
Love you all and thank you!

Thank you @ raouii.deviantart.com for the tileset

oucemar@gmail.com' or my Tweeter @raoucemar

music by JDBArtist

https://jdbartist.itch.io/classical-adventure-music-pack


and  I could not find the creator of the bugs, the file was named Just Sprites. If anyone recognizes the art I will change the information.
